name: Zxill: A Legend of Time
description: Fight, adventure and explore against the clock to collect the crystals and save the world. Perform this ancient ritual in time to witness the creation of a new larger world. Keep up the pace and watch your world expand. Fall behind and be cursed with saving the same world over and over. Die and risk losing everything...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz i5 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
